verses.text: KO E folofola na‘e hoko kia Selemaia meia Sihova, ‘i he taimi na‘e fekau kiate ia ‘e Kingi Setekaia ‘a Pāsua foha ‘o Malakaia, mo Sefanaia foha ‘o Ma‘aseia ko e taula‘eiki, ke lea ‘o pehē,

Huhū mu‘a kia Sihova ma‘atautolu; he ‘oku fai tau kiate kitautolu ‘e Nepukanesa ko e Tu‘i Pāpilone: hei‘ilo ‘e fai ma‘atautolu ‘e Sihova, ‘o taau mo ‘ene fu‘u ngāue fakaofo ko ē, kae ‘alu hake ia meiate kitautolu.
Pea tali ‘e Selemaia kiate kinautolu: Ko eni ‘a e lea te mou fai kia Setekaia, Ko e folofola eni ‘a Sihova ko e ‘Otua ‘o ‘Isileli:

Ko au eni ‘oku ou fakafoki ‘a e mahafu ‘oku ‘i homou nima, ‘a ia ‘oku mou fai tau ‘aki ‘i tua‘ā ki he Tu‘i Pāpilone, mo e kau Kalitia ‘oku fai ke ha‘o kimoutolu; pea te u fakatefua kinautolu ‘i loto kolo ni.
Pea ‘oku ou fai tau kiate kimoutolu ‘e au ‘aki ‘a e nima kuo mafao mo e nima mālohi, pea ‘i he ‘ita, mo e houhau, mo e tuputāmaki lahi.
Pea te u taa‘i ‘a e nofo he kolo ni, ‘a e tangata mo e manu fakatou‘osi: te nau mate ‘i ha fu‘u mahaki faka‘auha.

Pea hili ia–ko Sihova eni mei he Ta‘ehāmai–te u tuku ‘a Setekaia ko e Tu‘i Siuta, pea mo ‘ene kau tamaio‘eiki, pea mo e kakai, kaekehe ‘a kinautolu ‘i he kolo ni ‘oku toe mei he mahaki faka‘auha, mei he heletā, pea mei he honge–te u tuku kinautolu ki he nima ‘o Nepukanesa ko e Tu‘i Pāpilone, ‘io, ki he nima ‘o honau ngaahi fili, mo e nima ‘o e kakai ‘oku kumi ki he‘enau mo‘ui: pea te ne taa‘i kinautolu ‘aki ‘a e mata ‘o e heletā; ‘e ‘ikai te ne mamae kiate kinautolu, pea ‘e ‘ikai te ne lolou, pea ‘e ‘ikai te ne faka‘atu‘i.
Pea ko ho‘o lea ki he kakai ni ‘e pehē, Ko e folofola eni ‘a Sihova: Ko au eni ‘oku ou tuku ‘i homou ‘ao ‘a e hala ki he mo‘ui mo e hala ki he mate.
Ko ia te ne nofo ‘i he kolo ni te ne mate ‘i he heletā, mo e honge, mo e mate faka‘auha; ka ko ia te ne hū kitu‘a, ‘o tō ki he kau Kalitia ‘oku ‘ākolo‘i kimoutolu, te ne ‘ave ‘ene mo‘ui ma‘ane vete.
He kuo hanga hoku mata ki he kolo ni ke kovi, ‘o ‘ikai ke lelei–ko Sihova ia mei he Ta‘ehāmai–‘e tuku ia ki he nima ‘o e Tu‘i Pāpilone, pea te ne fakamomofi ‘aki ‘a e afi.
Pea ko e me‘a ki he fale ‘o e Tu‘i Siuta, mou fanongo ki he folofola ‘a Sihova:

Fale ‘o Tēvita ē, ko e folofola eni ‘a Sihova, Fai pongipongi ‘a e fakamaau, pea hamusi si‘i ngaohikovia mei he nima ‘o e fakamālohi, na‘a pā atu ‘eku houhau hangē ha afi, ‘o vela ta‘emafu‘ifu‘i, koe‘uhi ko e kovi ho‘omou fai anga.

Ko au eni ‘oku ou fili ‘aki koe, si‘i fefine nofo he tele‘a, he makatu‘u ‘o e toafa–ko Sihova ia mei he Ta‘ehāmai–‘a e fa‘ahinga ‘oku mou lau, Ko hai tū ‘e lava ke ‘alu hifo kiate kitautolu? pea ko hai tū ‘e lava ke hū ki hotau ngaahi nofo‘anga?
‘Ā, te u tautea kimoutolu, ‘o taau mo e fua ‘o ho‘omou fai anga–ko Sihova ia mei he Ta‘ehāmai–pea te u tafu ha afi ‘i hono vao, ‘a ia te ne keina hono feitu‘u kotoa takatakai,
